title: Enhancing Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Multi-Space 3D Virtual World Integrated Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational technology skills and experience in teaching social studies subjects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Develop at least two multimodal teaching-learning designs integrating 3D virtual worlds (e.g., Google Earth) and web-based learning platforms (e.g., Moodle)
Create PBL lesson plans for social studies using mobile AR applications and virtual globes, and conduct peer evaluations
Implement at least three educational scenarios that integrate diverse digital tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
